mapper.select: select * from hotel order by hotel_no desc
select * from hotel where address like '%'||#{address}||'%'
select room_no from room a,hotel b where a.sleeps=#{sleeps} and b.address like '%'||#{address}||'%' and a.hotel_no=b.hotel_no and a.room_no like '%-1'
mapper.update: update hotel set name=#{name},address=#{address}, hp1=#{hp1}, hp2=#{hp2}, hp3=#{hp3}, hotel_info=#{hotel_info}, star=#{star}, filename=#{filename}, filesize=#{filesize} where hotel_no=#{hotel_no}
